title: Americans travel to London to celebrate King Charles’ coronation
description: As London prepares for the first coronation in 70 years, Americans are traveling across the pond for tomorrow’s historic event. NBC News’ Kelly Cobiella speaks with some tourists about what King Charles and the royal family mean to them.

title: Coronation of King Charles III set to take place in London tomorrow
description: Ahead of the coronation, King Charles III, alongside the Prince and Princess of Wales, Will and Kate, greeted the public as they waited to celebrate the historic day. First Lady Jill Biden and Ukraine’s Olena Zelenska are also in London. However, polls show enthusiasm for the monarchy is waning. NBC News’ Keir Simmons has the latest royal updates.

title: Russian mercenaries threaten to quit unless they get more ammunition
description: A group of Russian mercenaries known as the Wagner Group has been leading the Russian charge in Eastern Ukraine where they have gained ground. Now, the head of the group says they’ll quit next week unless the Russian military stops blocking their ammunition shipments. NBC News’ Richard Engel reports on the ongoing conflict and the Kremlin accusing the U.S. and Ukraine of a drone attack.

title: Russian theater director accused of ‘justifying terrorism’ remanded in custody
description: A theatre director was remanded in custody after being accused of justifying terrorism with an award-winning play about women who married ISIS fighters.

title: Photos: Life of King Charles III
description: The coronation of King Charles III Saturday will be the culmination of a life spent in the eye of the public over whom he now reigns. Here are some photos that illustrate the life of Britain’s new monarch.

title: Video shows Russian and Ukrainian delegates scuffling over Ukrainian flag grab
description: A Ukrainian delegate punched a Russian delegate in the face during a summit of Black Sea nations in the Turkish capital, after his Ukrainian flag was snatched away to stop him photobombing a video interview with Russia's lead delegate. Video showed Ukraine's Olesandr Marikovski hitting the Russian and retrieving the blue and yellow flag.

title: Diplomats to discuss Syria’s return to Arab league after more than a decade
description: Diplomats from Arab nations are planning to discuss the prospect of Syria’s return to the Arab League more than a decade after its membership was suspended.

title: WHO declares end to Covid global health emergency
description: Covid is no longer a global public health emergency, the World Health Organization said on Friday.

title: U.S. Ambassador to China calls for resumption of high-level talks
description: United States Ambassador to China Nicholas Burns said that "it's an issue" that the communications between the U.S. and China have been deteriorating. NBC News' Janis Mackey Frayer spoke with Burns about what the two countries need to do to repair their relationship.

title: Jill Biden to represent U.S. at King Charles' coronation
description: In keeping with tradition, President Joe Biden will not attend King Charles III's coronation, but instead, Jill Biden will become the first U.S. first lady to attend the coronation of a British monarch. NBC News' Suzannah Lipscomb reports on what visitors can expect from the event.

title: Ukrainian delegate punches Russian in scuffle at Black Sea summit
description: Ukrainian and Russian delegates have had to be separated after a scuffle during a meeting of Black Sea countries in the Turkish capital Ankara.

title: Canada considers expelling Chinese diplomat for targeting lawmaker
description: Canada is considering the expulsion of Chinese diplomats over an intelligence agency report saying one of them plotted to intimidate the Hong Kong relatives of a Canadian lawmaker.

title: Angry chief of Russian mercenary force says his troops will withdraw from Bakhmut
description: In an angry tirade released on video, Yevgeny Prigozhin, chief of Wagner PMC, the mercenary group leading Russia's offensive in eastern Ukraine, said Friday that his forces will withdraw from the high-profile battle for Bakhmut due to a lack of military support from Moscow.

title: U.K.'s ruling Conservatives punished by voters on ‘terrible’ night
description: British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak’s Conservatives were facing a bleak set of local election results on Friday with voters punishing his party after a year of political scandals, surging inflation and stagnant economic growth.

title: With his wife set to attend King Charles’ coronation, Biden sends a message to a key ally
description: Jill Biden will become the first U.S. first lady to attend the coronation of a British monarch on Saturday.

title: New mass shooting leaves at least 8 dead in Serbia
description: Serbian police said they have arrested a suspect in a drive-by shooting attack that killed at least eight and wounded 14, the nation’s second such mass shooting in two days.

title: Prince Harry will attend his father's coronation, but without his wife Meghan
description: Buckingham Palace and a spokesperson for the couple confirmed that Harry would attend the event, while Meghan would remain in California with the couple's two young children. NBC News' Molly Hunter reports on what may be a difficult time for royal relationships amid the celebrations.
